column1: '''Elvenesse''' was a term whose meaning is not clearly defined
column2: but which seems to refer to all the lands of the [[Elves]]
column3: both west and east of the [[Belegaer|Great Sea]].

column1: The ending ''-ess'' (also in [[Westernesse]]) was used in romance literature for fictional lands that had partly francized names (as in [[wikipedia:Lyonesse|Lyonesse]] in [[wikipedia:Matter of Britain|Arthurian legends]]).<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}
